2025-10-21T09:35:00.CONTENT_EN: Members of the public heading for Cross Bay Bridge are advised that the cycle track and footpath of the Cross Bay Bridge are going to be closed soon due to high wind. Please use alternative route for travelling to LOHAS Park and Tiu Keng Leng.
2025-10-21T09:35:00.CONTENT_CN: 前往跨灣大橋人士請注意，因強風，跨灣大橋單車徑及行人路即將封閉。請改用其他單車徑及行人路前往日出康城及調景嶺。

2025-10-21T11:00:00.CONTENT_EN: Due to high wind , the following arrangements have been implemented on cycle track and footpath of Cross Bay Bridge at Tseung Kwan O: Members of the public heading for Cross Bay Bridge are advised that the cycle track and footpath of the Cross Bay Bridge have been closed due to high wind. Please use alternative route for travelling to LOHAS Park and Tiu Keng Leng.
2025-10-21T11:00:00.CONTENT_CN: 因強風，將軍澳跨灣大橋單車徑及行人路現已實施下列安排: 前往跨灣大橋人士請注意，因強風，跨灣大橋單車徑及行人路已經封閉。請改用其他單車徑及行人路前往日出康城及調景嶺。

2025-10-23T00:57:00.CONTENT_EN: Due to improved weather condition, the following arrangements have been implemented on cycle track and footpath of Cross Bay Bridge at Tseung Kwan O: Members of the public heading for Cross Bay Bridge are advised that the cycle track and footpath of Cross Bay Bridge have been re-opened.
2025-10-23T00:57:00.CONTENT_CN: 因天氣情況改善，將軍澳跨灣大橋單車徑及行人路現已實施下列安排: 前往跨灣大橋人士請注意，跨灣大橋單車徑及行人路已經重開。

2025-10-22T19:15:00.CONTENT_EN: Due to improved weather condition, the following arrangements have been implemented on Hong Kong-Zhuhai-Macao Bridge Hong Kong Link Road (HZMB HKLR): The speed limit of the HZMB HKLR resumes to 100 km/h.
2025-10-22T19:15:00.CONTENT_CN: 因天氣情況改善，港珠澳大橋香港連接路已實施以下安排： 港珠澳大橋香港連接路最高車速限制恢復為每小時100 公里。

2025-10-22T21:33:00.CONTENT_EN: Under the combined effect of spring tide and the northeast monsoon, the following pedestrian subway along Sha Tin Shing Mun River has been closed by the Highway Department: Connecting Tai Chung Kiu Road and Shing Mun River riverside NS35(near Belair Garden) Pedestrians please take note of the above arrangement, and consider using other roads.
2025-10-22T21:33:00.CONTENT_CN: 受天文大潮及東北季候風的共同影響，路政署已封閉以下位於沙田城門河沿岸的行人隧道: 連接大涌橋路與城門河畔 NS35(近富豪花園) 行人請注意上述安排，並改用其他道路。

2025-10-23T00:46:00.CONTENT_EN: The following pedestrian subway along Sha Tin Shing Mun River is now reopened: Connecting Tai Chung Kiu Road and Shing Mun River riverside NS35(near Belair Garden)
2025-10-23T00:46:00.CONTENT_CN: 以下位於沙田城門河沿岸的行人隧道已經重開: 連接大涌橋路與城門河畔 NS35(近富豪花園)

2025-10-23T23:53:00.CONTENT_EN: Due to high wind , the following special traffic and transport arrangements have been implemented on Hong Kong-Zhuhai-Macao Bridge Hong Kong Link Road (HZMB HKLR), with details as shown below: The speed limit of the HZMB HKLR is lowered from 100 km/h to 50 km/h.
2025-10-23T23:53:00.CONTENT_CN: 由於強⾵，港珠澳⼤橋⾹港連接路已實施以下特別交通及運輸安排： 港珠澳⼤橋⾹港連接路的最⾼⾞速限制由每⼩時100 公⾥降低⾄每⼩時50 公⾥。

2025-10-24T06:10:00.CONTENT_EN: Due to improved weather condition, the following special traffic and transport arrangements have been implemented on Hong Kong Zhuhai-Macao-Bridge Hong Kong Link Road (HZMB HKLR): - The speed limit of the HZMB HKLR resumes to 100 km/h
2025-10-24T06:10:00.CONTENT_CN: 因天氣情況改善，港珠澳大橋香港連接路現已實施下列特別交通及運輸安排: -港珠澳大橋香港連接路最高車速限制回復每小時100 公里。

2025-10-24T03:13:00.CONTENT_EN: Lantau Link: Due to strong wind, the following temporary traffic measure is implemented on Lantau Link: The speed limit of Lantau Link is reduced to 50km/h. Ting Kau Bridge: Due to strong wind, the following temporary traffic arrangement is implemented on Ting Kau Bridge: The speed limit of Ting Kau Bridge is reduced to 50km/h. Members of the public are advised to watch out for the latest traffic news through radio and television broadcasts, and for the traffic signs on site.
2025-10-24T03:13:00.CONTENT_CN: 青嶼幹線： 由於強風關係，青嶼幹線已實施下列臨時交通措施： 青嶼幹線的車速限制降至每小時50 公里。 汀九橋： 由於強風關係，汀九橋已實施下列臨時交通措施： 汀九橋的車速限制降至每小時50 公里。 市民請留意電台/電視廣播的最新交通消息，以及現場的交通標誌。

2025-10-24T06:02:00.CONTENT_EN: Lantau Link: The temporary speed limit arrangement which was implemented before in the Lantau Link is cancelled. Ting Kau Bridge: The temporary speed limit arrangement which was implemented before in the Ting Kau Bridge is cancelled. Members of the public are advised to watch out for the latest traffic news through radio and television broadcasts, and for the traffic signs on site.
2025-10-24T06:02:00.CONTENT_CN: 青嶼幹線： 較早前於青嶼幹線實施的臨時車速限制措施現已取消。 汀九橋： 較早前於汀九橋實施的臨時車速限制措施現已取消。 市民請留意電台/電視廣播的最新交通消息，以及現場的交通標誌。

description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_CN: 機場管理局 早上繁忙時段

2025-10-25T06:08:00.CONTENT_EN: Due to heavy traffic at the road section leading from Airport Road to Hong Kong International Airport’s Terminal 1 Departures Kerb, motorists are advised to use the drop-off area at the Airport’s Car Park 1. Members of the public heading to the Airport are advised to allow sufficient time for their journey and consider taking the Airport Express and buses.
2025-10-25T06:08:00.CONTENT_CN: 現時機場路通往香港國際機場一號客運大樓離港層落客區的路段交通繁忙，駕駛人士請考慮改用機場一號停車場落客區。前往機場的市民，請預留足夠交通時間，並考慮乘搭機場快綫或巴士。
